column2: *The Command hails you on the emergency line.* Aurora 2, come in. Aurora 2, come in, how copy?
I copy, this is the Aurora 2.
A large number of unidentified ships. They're coming in from the left. Probably the invasion fleet.
Try not to get in the Voyager's way, they have their own orders. And Captain… May God be with you.
Great. The only thing missing is the fanfare.
